highlights.content: Collaborated in peer programming with junior developers, conducted technical interviews, and performed code reviews to ensure quality and maintain coding standards

projects.name: Dashboard Components Library
projects.description: A Vue library with components using our internal design library to help developers across teams avoid reimplementing the same components for their dashboards.

highlights.content: Created documentation to help developers contribute to or use the library, leveraging PRs to facilitate code reviews.
Added unit tests and E2E tests using Vue Test Utils and Storybook, enabling developers to reuse components without needing to add additional tests.
Implemented a CI/CD pipeline to deploy the library upon merging, with the ability to create snapshots for QA.

projects.name: Customer Dashboard
projects.description: Platform for customers to configure and get information about different company APIs. Implemented as a micro-frontend, where each subpage is a separate project.

highlights.content: Refactored several products to migrate them to the micro-frontend architecture, improving modularity and maintainability.
Developed templates, workflows, and libraries to standardize micro-frontend practices and ensure consistency across teams.
Created a deployment workflow to serve micro-frontends on S3 and make them available directly in the dashboard.
Implemented CI workflows to check linting, run tests, and detect build errors before PR approval, ensuring code quality.

projects.name: Partner Portal
projects.description: Worked on a micro frontend infrastructure for a multi-tenant dashboard for company partners.

highlights.content: Designed an architecture for micro frontends across the teams to define how micro frontends should communicate with each other.
Added unit tests on the backend using Mockito and on the frontend using Vue Test Utils to ensure code quality and reliability.
Developed the backend based on a microservices architecture to support the multi-tenant dashboard.

projects.name: No Code Platform
projects.description: Developed on an internal no-code platform which allows teams to create frontends to interact with different APIs across the company.

highlights.content: Designed and developed a second version of the platform to improve the experience of development.
Migrated an entire internal tool to our no-code platform, saving cloud costs and increasing security by reducing vulnerabilities.

Migrated an entire project to an in-house no-code platform, eliminating 20+ security vulnerabilities, removing the need for a separate maintenance project, and reducing cloud costs by 30% (including web server, database, and backend).
Delivered 3 award-winning projects with advanced designs and animations. Awards: 2 Honorable Mentions at Awwwards, 'Site of the Day' at Mindsparkle and CSSWinner.
Integrated Sentry for real-time error monitoring, reducing client issues and enabling resolution within 24 hours.
Accelerated project setup by creating a standardized template repository and build process using Git and Webpack.
Enhanced team communication and project delivery by implementing agile methodologies and SCRUM-based planning in Asana.
Implemented CI/CD with GitHub Actions for automatic staging updates, improving development and QA efficiency.

projects.name: Voice Chatbot
projects.description: Created a company assistant which uses LLM to get context to the company and interacts with end users through voice, designed to recommend and also perform actions like scheduling a call or registering.

highlights.content: Created an extensible infrastructure which allows to easily extend the capabilities of the chatbot for new clients.
Created a design system for the chatbot which allows performing different animations and transitions during the conversation flow.

team: Projects I have worked on independently
